name: The Hive (itch) (Scylez)
description:
The Hive is a small dungeon crawler based on the final area of my visual novel "Chasing Tail". You play as Scylez trying to venture deeper into the villain's realm to collect his friends.

This game will randomly generate a larger and larger dungeon after every cleared level. Upgrades can be purchased to make the next level down a little easier to navigate. 

This game is in development and is not finished. I will be taking suggestions on features to add and changes to make!
